channel.title: My 3d printed remote control helper (GbG israel)
channel.description:
Hay guys, I have designed a small plastic device (see pic) to help the kids that have a hard time controlling a mechanical switch and remote
My design is free in this link. https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:2118435
I would love any comments or tips.

item.title: My 3d printed remote control helper (GbG israel)
item.dc:creator: Pete-from-POP
item.description:
I’d never been a big fan of buying cars with remotes for the kiddos we’ve worked with, but now that you’ve opened my eyes a little to the possibilities of handing over the remote to the kid themselves … gonna have to give that a try sometime thanks for sharing

Read full topic
item.source: My 3d printed remote control helper (GbG israel)

item.title: My 3d printed remote control helper (GbG israel)
item.dc:creator: mikey
item.description:
Hay guys, I have designed a small plastic device (see pic) to help the kids that have a hard time controlling a mechanical switch and remote

My design is free in this link.

thingiverse.com

Go baby go israel - hand helper. by houdini

well its a bit self explanatory. helps with moving the remote control. made for a non profit named go baby go Israel who build electric cars for disabled kids. any problems questions tips remix please send me a message. UPDATE: first_half_V2 -...

I would love any comments or tips.

Read full topic
